name: Add Logo Backoffice Easily
author: ☆☆ EVENTTEX ☆☆

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to easily add a logo at the top of all pages of the WordPress admin interface.

Installation in WordPress admin

  1. Go to your WordPress administration Extensions > Add

  2. Search for Add Logo Backoffice Easily (use the search form)

  3. Click the Install and Activate button of the extension

Installation FTP

  1. Download the full Add Logo Backoffice Easily folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the extension from the ‘Extension’ menu in WordPress

Adding a logo

  • Go to the “Add Logo Bo” tab in the sidebar and add your logo

short_description: Requires at least Wordpress : 6.1 Tested up to: 6.5.5 Stable tag: 1.0.1 Requires PHP: 7.1 License: GPLv2 or later License URI: https://www.gnu.
